newsitem.title: CANADA: Dia Met plans C$36.9 mln share issue.
newsitem.headline: Dia Met plans C$36.9 mln share issue.

text.p: Dia Met Minerals Ltd said on Tuesday it planned to offer 1.8 million class A subordinate voting shares at C$20.50 each for gross proceeds of C$36.9 million.

Dia Met, a diamond exploration company, last month announced plans to raise about C$30 million with a share offering but did not provide details. The issue is expected to close around April 8 and proceeds will be used for exploration expenses and working capital.
Dia Met said underwriters were granted an option to purchase up to 10 percent of the total number of shares offered.

After completion of the offering, and assuming the exercise in full of the over-allotment option, about 7,819,824 class A Subordinate Voting Shares will be outstanding and gross proceeds from the financing will be C$40,590,000.
RBC Dominion Securities Inc. is lead manager with First Marathon Securities Limited, Nesbitt Burns Inc., Bunting Warburg Inc. and Research Capital Corporation comanagers.
